item.title: Mar 18
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a writer, write a blog post on why you like technology Mar 18 [!tldr] Mar 18 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize Dear Technology Lover, It’s hard to imagine a world without technology. From smartphones and laptops to smart home devices and online shopping, these technological innovations have become a staple in our daily lives. But why exactly do we love technology so much?
